title: W. Grand Blvd Home (2-Family, lower unit)
map_address: 1548 W Grand Blvd near W Warren
posting_body: West Grand Blvd 2-family home with an excellent location at W. Warren near I-94 and I-96.
Lower unit is for rent and currently under renovation by owner.
Home features three bedrooms (one with an ante-room), one bathroom, and kitchen.
Monthly rent is $950 per month, includes water/sewer with a cap of $80 per month.
All applicants must have proof of stable monthly income.
Owner is available to show at any time.
